column12: AUTHENTICATION OF DATA SOURCES OVER A UNIDIRECTIONAL, COMMUNICATION LINK
column13: Die Erfindung schafft ein Verfahren zur Verifizierung eines in einem zu prüfenden Device (D) gespeicherten Datensatzes durch ein Prüfgerät (P) mittels eines Challenge-Response-Verfahrens. Der Challenge-Geber (C) ist als ein von dem Prüfgerät (P) unterschiedlicher externer Challenge-Geber (C) gestaltet und stellt den Challenge an das Device (D) und an das Prüfgerät (P) bereit. Das Prüfgerät (P) verifiziert mittels eines vom Challenge-Geber (C) empfangenen bzw. abgestimmt mit dem Challenge-Geber (C) berechneten Challenge einen vom Device (D) empfangenen Challenge.

column13: Die Erfindung schafft ein Verfahren zur Verifizierung eines in einem zu prüfenden Device (D) gespeicherten Datensatzes durch ein Prüfgerät (P) mittels eines Challenge-Response-Verfahrens. Der Challenge-Geber (C) ist als ein von dem Prüfgerät (P) unterschiedlicher externer Challenge-Geber (C) gestaltet und stellt den Challenge an das Device (D) und an das Prüfgerät (P) bereit. Das Prüfgerät (P) verifiziert mittels eines vom Challenge-Geber (C) empfangenen bzw. abgestimmt mit dem Challenge-Geber (C) berechneten Challenge einen vom Device (D) empfangenen Challenge.

column12: HOME APPLIANCE COMPRISING A PLASMA GENERATOR AND PROCESS OF OPERATING THE SAME
PLASMA ACTIVATED WATER FOR DISINFECTING HOME APPLIANCES AND BLEACHING
column13: The present invention relates to a home appliance having a water cycle, in particular a dishwasher, a washing machine or a dryer, wherein a plasma generator for generating a cold atmospheric pressure plasma is integrated into the water cycle so that it can activate water circulating in the home appliance. Moreover, the present invention relates to a home appliance comprising a plasma generator, which generates active species having a bleaching activity in the water circulating in the home appliance. The present invention also relates to a process for operating a home appliance having a water cycle, wherein plasma activated water is generated and circulated in the home appliance and the use of a plasma generator to generate active species having a bleaching activity in the water circulating in a home appliance.

column12: PLASMA ACTIVATED WATER FOR DISINFECTING HOME APPLIANCES AND BLEACHING
column13: A home appliance having a water cycle, in particular a dishwasher, a washing machine or a dryer, wherein a plasma generator for generating a cold atmospheric pressure plasma is integrated into the water cycle so that it can activate water circulating in the home appliance. Moreover, a home appliance comprising a plasma generator, which generates active species having a bleaching activity in the water circulating in the home appliance. Also provided is a process for operating a home appliance having a water cycle, wherein plasma activated water is generated and circulated in the home appliance and the use of a plasma generator to generate active species having a bleaching activity in the water circulating in a home appliance.

column12: PLASMA ACTIVATED WATER FOR DISINFECTING HOME APPLIANCES AND BLEACHING
PLASMA ACTIVATED WATER FOR DISINFECTING HOME APPLIANCES
column13: The present invention relates to a home appliance having a water cycle, in particular a dishwasher (1), a washing machine or a dryer, wherein a plasma generator (16) for generating a cold atmospheric pressure plasma is integrated into the water cycle so that it can activate water circulating in the home appliance. More specifically, the present invention relates to a home appliance having a water cycle, wherein a plasma generator (16) is integrated at a specific position of the water cycle so that the activated water is circulated in the water cycle of the home appliance. The present invention also relates to a process for operating a home appliance having a water cycle, wherein plasma activated water is generated and circulated in the home appliance.
